property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Open Dataflow Project plugin V1.2.5 * improved simulation speed * Action priority analysis bug fixed * NL parsing bug fixed (type parameters) V1.2.4 * Reverted to Java 1.5 V1.2.3 =============================================== * Improved console I/O behavior * Minor bug fixes V1.2.0 =============================================== * Improved simulator interface * Run config dialog tab for console I/O control * Improved error reporting from editor V1.1.0 =============================================== * make dataflow simulator available from the std Eclipse run dialog. * fix problems opening files outside project V1.0.1 =============================================== * Improved outlining including icons and preservation of expanded state. * Changed .CAL and .NL images. * Added to PDF documentation.

instructions.instruction: Bundle-Name: Open Dataflow Documentation Bundle-Version: 1.2.14 Bundle-SymbolicName: net.sf.opendf.eclipse.doc;singleton:=true Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Bundle-Vendor: The Open Dataflow Project Bundle-Localization: plugin

Require-Bundle: org.eclipse.core.runtime,org.eclipse.debug.core,org.eclipse.debug.ui,org.eclipse.jface.text,org.eclipse.ui,org.eclipse.ui.console,org.eclipse.ui.editors,org.eclipse.ui.ide,org.eclipse.ui.views,org.eclipse.ui.workbench.texteditor,net.sf.opendf.eclipse.core Bundle-Activator: net.sf.opendf.eclipse.plugin.OpendfPlugin Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-Version: 1.2.14 Bundle-SymbolicName: net.sf.opendf.eclipse.plugin;singleton:=true Bundle-Localization: Provide-Package: net.sf.opendf.eclipse.plugin,net.sf.opendf.eclipse.plugin.config,net.sf.opendf.eclipse.plugin.editors,net.sf.opendf.eclipse.plugin.editors.checkers,net.sf.opendf.eclipse.plugin.editors.outline,net.sf.opendf.eclipse.plugin.editors.rules,net.sf.opendf.eclipse.plugin.editors.scanners,net.sf.opendf.eclipse.plugin.launcher,net.sf.opendf.eclipse.plugin.launcher.tabs Bundle-Name: Open Dataflow Editor Plugin Bundle-Vendor: The Open Dataflow Project Eclipse-LazyStart: true

Bundle-Vendor: The Open Dataflow Project Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Bundle-Activator: net.sf.opendf.eclipse.plugin.hardwarecompiler.Activator Bundle-ClassPath: .,lib/saxon8-dom.jar,lib/saxon8.jar,source/xslt/ Require-Bundle: net.sf.opendf.eclipse.core,net.sf.opendf.eclipse.plugin,org.eclipse.ui,org.eclipse.core.runtime,org.eclipse.debug.ui,org.eclipse.ui.console Import-Package: net.sf.openforge.app,net.sf.openforge.frontend.xlim.builder,net.sf.openforge.util.io,net.sf.openforge.util.xml Bundle-Name: Hardware Compiler Plug-in Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-SymbolicName: net.sf.opendf.eclipse.HardwareCompiler;singleton:=true Bundle-Version: 1.0.18 Eclipse-LazyStart: true

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Provides CAL/NL editing capablity and documentation.

instructions.instruction: Bundle-Vendor: The Open Dataflow Project Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Bundle-Activator: net.sf.opendf.eclipse.coreplugin.Activator Bundle-ClassPath: .,source/xslt/,lib/saxon8.jar,lib/saxon8-dom.jar,lib/PtPlot.jar Require-Bundle: org.eclipse.core.runtime Bundle-Name: Open Dataflow Core Plug-in Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-SymbolicName: property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Provides the Hardware compiler from Cal implementation

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: This feature enables compilation of CAL/NL Dataflow networks to Hardware Description Language (HDL) implementations. This feature requires the com.xilinx.df.core plugin to supply the compiler core.

instructions.instruction: Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Bundle-Activator: openforge.Activator Bundle-RequiredExecutionEnvironment: JavaSE-1.6 Bundle-ClassPath: source/xslt/,.,lib/saxon8-dom.jar,lib/saxon8.jar Require-Bundle: org.eclipse.core.runtime Bundle-Name: OpenForge Plug-in Bundle-ActivationPolicy: lazy Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-SymbolicName: net.sf.openforge.core;singleton:=true Bundle-Version: 1.0.18 Export-Package: net.sf.openforge.app,net.sf.openforge.frontend.xlim.builder,net.sf.openforge.util.io,net.sf.openforge.util.xml

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: This feature enables compilation of CAL/NL Dataflow networks to Hardware Description Language (HDL) implementations. This feature requires the com.xilinx.df.core plugin to supply the compiler core.

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: Open Dataflow Project plugin V1.2.5 * improved simulation speed * Action priority analysis bug fixed * NL parsing bug fixed (type parameters) V1.2.4 * Reverted to Java 1.5 V1.2.3 =============================================== * Improved console I/O behavior * Minor bug fixes V1.2.0 =============================================== * Improved simulator interface * Run config dialog tab for console I/O control * Improved error reporting from editor V1.1.0 =============================================== * make dataflow simulator available from the std Eclipse run dialog. * fix problems opening files outside project V1.0.1 =============================================== * Improved outlining including icons and preservation of expanded state. * Changed .CAL and .NL images. * Added to PDF documentation.
